arabic: اِقْتَرَبَتِ السَّاعَةُ وَانْشَقَّ الْقَمَرُ
transliteration_en: Iqtarabatis Saa'atu wsan shaqqal qamar
transliteration_id: Iqtarabatis-sā‘atu wansyaqqal-qamar(u).
translation_en: The Hour has come near, and the moon has split [in two].
translation_id: Hari Kiamat makin dekat dan bulan terbelah.

arabic: وَاِنْ يَّرَوْا اٰيَةً يُّعْرِضُوْا وَيَقُوْلُوْا سِحْرٌ مُّسْتَمِرٌّ
transliteration_en: Wa iny yaraw aayatany yu'ridoo wa yaqooloo sihrum mustamirr
transliteration_id: Wa iy yarau āyatay yu‘riḍū wa yaqūlū siḥrum mustamirr(un).
translation_en: And if they see a miracle, they turn away and say, "Passing magic."
translation_id: Jika mereka (kaum musyrik Makkah) melihat suatu tanda (mukjizat), mereka berpaling dan berkata, “(Ini adalah) sihir yang terus-menerus.”

arabic: وَكَذَّبُوْا وَاتَّبَعُوْٓا اَهْوَاۤءَهُمْ وَكُلُّ اَمْرٍ مُّسْتَقِرٌّ
transliteration_en: Wa kazzaboo wattaba'ooo ahwaaa'ahum; wa kullu amrim mustaqirr
transliteration_id: Wa każżabū wattaba‘ū ahwā'ahum wa kullu amrim mustaqirr(un).
translation_en: And they denied and followed their inclinations. But for every matter is a [time of] settlement.
translation_id: Mereka mendustakan (Nabi Muhammad) dan mengikuti keinginan mereka, padahal setiap urusan telah ada ketetapannya.

arabic: وَلَقَدْ جَاۤءَهُمْ مِّنَ الْاَنْۢبَاۤءِ مَا فِيْهِ مُزْدَجَرٌۙ
transliteration_en: Wa laqad jaaa'ahum minal ambaaa'i maa feehi muzdajar
transliteration_id: Wa laqad jā'ahum minal-ambā'i mā fīhi muzdajar(un).
translation_en: And there has already come to them of information that in which there is deterrence -
translation_id: Sungguh, benar-benar telah datang kepada mereka beberapa berita yang di dalamnya terdapat ancaman (terhadap orang-orang kafir).

arabic: حِكْمَةٌ ۢ بَالِغَةٌ فَمَا تُغْنِ النُّذُرُۙ
transliteration_en: Hikmatum baalighatun famaa tughnin nuzur
transliteration_id: Ḥikmatum bāligatun famā tugnin-nużur(u).
translation_en: Extensive wisdom - but warning does not avail [them].
translation_id: (Berita-berita itu adalah) hikmah yang sempurna, tetapi peringatan-peringatan itu tidak berguna (bagi mereka).

arabic: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ ۘ يَوْمَ يَدْعُ الدَّاعِ اِلٰى شَيْءٍ نُّكُرٍۙ
transliteration_en: Fatawalla 'anhum; yawma yad'ud daa'i ilaa shai 'in nukur
transliteration_id: Fa tawalla ‘anhum, yauma yad‘ud-dā‘i ilā syai'in nukur(in).
translation_en: So leave them, [O Muhammad]. The Day the Caller calls to something forbidding,
translation_id: Maka, berpalinglah (Nabi Muhammad) dari mereka. Pada hari (ketika) penyeru (malaikat) mengajak (mereka) pada sesuatu yang tidak menyenangkan (hari Pembalasan),

arabic: خُشَّعًا اَبْصَارُهُمْ يَخْرُجُوْنَ مِنَ الْاَجْدَاثِ كَاَنَّهُمْ جَرَادٌ مُّنْتَشِرٌۙ
transliteration_en: khushsha'an absaaruhum yakrujoona minal ajdaasi ka annahum jaraadum muntashir
transliteration_id: Khusysya‘an abṣāruhum yakhrujūna minal-ajdāṡi ka'annahum jarādum muntasyir(un).
translation_en: Their eyes humbled, they will emerge from the graves as if they were locusts spreading,
translation_id: pandangan mereka tertunduk. Mereka keluar (berhamburan) dari kubur seperti belalang yang beterbangan.

arabic: مُّهْطِعِيْنَ اِلَى الدَّاعِۗ يَقُوْلُ الْكٰفِرُوْنَ هٰذَا يَوْمٌ عَسِرٌ
transliteration_en: Muhti'eena ilad daa'i yaqoolul kafiroona haazaa yawmun 'asir
transliteration_id: Muhṭi‘īna ilad-dā‘(i), yaqūlul-kāfirūna hāżā yaumun ‘asir(un).
translation_en: Racing ahead toward the Caller. The disbelievers will say, "This is a difficult Day."
translation_id: Mereka bersegera datang kepada penyeru itu. Orang-orang kafir berkata, “Ini adalah hari yang sulit.”

arabic: ۞ كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوْحٍ فَكَذَّبُوْا عَبْدَنَا وَقَالُوْا مَجْنُوْنٌ وَّازْدُجِرَ
transliteration_en: Kazzabat qablahum qawmu Noohin fakazzaboo 'abdanaa wa qaaloo majnoo nunw wazdujir
transliteration_id: Każżabat qablahum qaumu nūḥin fakażżabū ‘abdanā wa qālū majnūnuw wazdujir(a).
translation_en: The people of Noah denied before them, and they denied Our servant and said, "A madman," and he was repelled.
translation_id: Sebelum mereka, kaum Nuh juga telah mendustakan (rasul). Mereka mendustakan hamba Kami (Nuh) dan mengatakan, “(Dia) orang gila!” Dia pun dibentak (dengan cacian dan lainnya).

arabic: فَدَعَا رَبَّهٗٓ اَنِّيْ مَغْلُوْبٌ فَانْتَصِرْ
transliteration_en: Fada'aa Rabbahooo annee maghloobun fantasir
transliteration_id: Fa da‘ā rabbahū annī maglūbun fantaṣir.
translation_en: So he invoked his Lord, "Indeed, I am overpowered, so help."
translation_id: Dia (Nuh) lalu mengadu kepada Tuhannya, “Sesungguhnya aku telah dikalahkan, maka tolonglah (aku).”

arabic: فَفَتَحْنَآ اَبْوَابَ السَّمَاۤءِ بِمَاۤءٍ مُّنْهَمِرٍۖ
transliteration_en: Fafatahnaaa abwaabas sa maaa'i bimaa'im munhamir
transliteration_id: Fa fataḥnā abwābas-samā'i bimā'im munhamir(in).
translation_en: Then We opened the gates of the heaven with rain pouring down
translation_id: Lalu, Kami membukakan pintu-pintu langit dengan (menurunkan) air yang tercurah.

arabic: وَّفَجَّرْنَا الْاَرْضَ عُيُوْنًا فَالْتَقَى الْمَاۤءُ عَلٰٓى اَمْرٍ قَدْ قُدِرَ ۚ
transliteration_en: Wa fajjamal arda 'uyoonan faltaqal maaa'u 'alaaa amrin qad qudir
transliteration_id: Wa fajjarnal-arḍa ‘uyūnan faltaqal-mā'u ‘alā amrin qad qudir(a).
translation_en: And caused the earth to burst with springs, and the waters met for a matter already predestined.
translation_id: Kami pun menjadikan bumi menyemburkan banyak mata air. Maka, berkumpullah semua air itu sehingga (meluap dan menimbulkan) bencana yang telah ditetapkan.

arabic: وَحَمَلْنٰهُ عَلٰى ذَاتِ اَلْوَاحٍ وَّدُسُرٍۙ
transliteration_en: Wa hamalnaahu 'alaa zaati alwaahinw wa dusur
transliteration_id: Wa ḥamalnāhu ‘alā żāti alwāḥiw wa dusur(in).
translation_en: And We carried him on a [construction of] planks and nails,
translation_id: Kami mengangkut dia (Nuh) ke atas (kapal) yang terbuat dari papan dan pasak

arabic: تَجْرِيْ بِاَعْيُنِنَاۚ جَزَاۤءً لِّمَنْ كَانَ كُفِرَ
transliteration_en: Tajree bi a'yuninaa jazaaa 'al liman kaana kufir
transliteration_id: Tajrī bi'a‘yuninā, jazā'al liman kāna kufir(a).
translation_en: Sailing under Our observation as reward for he who had been denied.
translation_id: yang berlayar dengan pengawasan Kami sebagai balasan (kebaikan) bagi orang yang telah diingkari (kaumnya).

arabic: وَلَقَدْ تَّرَكْنٰهَآ اٰيَةً فَهَلْ مِنْ مُّدَّكِرٍ
transliteration_en: Wa laqat taraknaahaad aayatan fahal mim muddakir
transliteration_id: Wa laqat taraknāhā āyatan fahal mim muddakir(in).
translation_en: And We left it as a sign, so is there any who will remember?
translation_id: Sungguh, Kami benar-benar telah menjadikan (kapal) itu sebagai tanda (pelajaran). Maka, adakah orang yang mau mengambil pelajaran?

arabic: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِيْ وَنُذُرِ
transliteration_en: Fakaifa kaana 'azaabee wa nuzur
transliteration_id: Fa kaifa kāna ‘ażābī wa nużur(i).
translation_en: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.
translation_id: Betapa dahsyatnya azab dan peringatan-Ku!

arabic: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْاٰنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِنْ مُّدَّكِرٍ
transliteration_en: Wa laqad yassamal Quraana liz zikri fahal mimmuddakir
transliteration_id: Wa laqad yassarnal-qur'āna liż-żikri fahal mim muddakir(in).
translation_en: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
translation_id: Sungguh, Kami benar-benar telah memudahkan Al-Qur’an sebagai pelajaran. Maka, adakah orang yang mau mengambil pelajaran?

arabic: كَذَّبَتْ عَادٌ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِيْ وَنُذُرِ
transliteration_en: Kazzabat 'Aadun fakaifa kaana 'azaabee wa nuzur
transliteration_id: Każżabat ‘ādun fa kaifa kāna ‘ażābī wa nużur(i).
translation_en: 'Aad denied; and how [severe] were My punishment and warning.
translation_id: (Kaum) ‘Ad pun telah mendustakan (rasul mereka). Maka, betapa dahsyatnya azab dan peringatan-Ku!

arabic: اِنَّآ اَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ رِيْحًا صَرْصَرًا فِيْ يَوْمِ نَحْسٍ مُّسْتَمِرٍّۙ
transliteration_en: Innaa arsalnaa 'alaihim reehan sarsaran fee Yawmi nahsim mustamirr
transliteration_id: Innā arsalnā ‘alaihim rīḥan ṣarṣaran fī yaumi naḥsim mustamirr(in).
translation_en: Indeed, We sent upon them a screaming wind on a day of continuous misfortune,
translation_id: Sesungguhnya Kami telah mengembuskan angin yang sangat kencang kepada mereka pada hari nahas yang terus-menerus,

arabic: تَنْزِعُ النَّاسَۙ كَاَنَّهُمْ اَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍ مُّنْقَعِرٍ
transliteration_en: Tanzi;un naasa ka anna huma'jaazu nakhlim munqa'ir
transliteration_id: Tanzi‘un-nās(a), ka'annahum a‘jāzu nakhlim munqa‘ir(in).
translation_en: Extracting the people as if they were trunks of palm trees uprooted.
translation_id: yang membuat manusia bergelimpangan, seakan-akan mereka itu pohon-pohon kurma yang tumbang dengan akar-akarnya.

arabic: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِيْ وَنُذُرِ
transliteration_en: 'Fakaifa kaana 'azaabee wa nuzur
transliteration_id: Fa kaifa kāna ‘ażābī wa nużur(i).
translation_en: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.
translation_id: Maka, betapa dahsyatnya azab dan peringatan-Ku!

arabic: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْاٰنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِنْ مُّدَّكِرٍ ࣖ
transliteration_en: Wa laqad yassamal Quraana liz zikri fahal mim muddakir
transliteration_id: Wa laqad yassarnal-qur'āna liż-żikri fahal mim muddakir(in).
translation_en: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
translation_id: Sungguh, Kami benar-benar telah memudahkan Al-Qur’an sebagai pelajaran. Maka, adakah orang yang mau mengambil pelajaran?

arabic: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُوْدُ بِالنُّذُرِ
transliteration_en: Kazzabat Samoodu binnuzur
transliteration_id: Każżabat ṡamūdu bin-nużur(i).
translation_en: Thamud denied the warning
translation_id: (Kaum) Samud pun telah mendustakan peringatan-peringatan.

arabic: فَقَالُوْٓا اَبَشَرًا مِّنَّا وَاحِدًا نَّتَّبِعُهٗٓ  ۙاِنَّآ اِذًا لَّفِيْ ضَلٰلٍ وَّسُعُرٍ
transliteration_en: Faqaalooo a-basharam minnaa waahidan nattabi'uhooo innaa izal lafee dalaalinw wa su'ur
transliteration_id: Fa qālū abasyaram minnā wāḥidan nattabi‘uh(ū), innā iżal lafī ḍalāliw wa su‘ur(in).
translation_en: And said, "Is it one human being among us that we should follow? Indeed, we would then be in error and madness.
translation_id: Mereka berkata, “Bagaimana kita akan mengikuti seorang manusia (biasa) di antara kita? Sesungguhnya kalau begitu kita benar-benar telah sesat dan gila.

arabic: ءَاُلْقِيَ الذِّكْرُ عَلَيْهِ مِنْۢ بَيْنِنَا بَلْ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ اَشِرٌ
transliteration_en: 'A-ulqiyaz zikru 'alaihi mim baininaa bal huwa kazzaabun ashir
transliteration_id: A'ulqiyaż-żikru ‘alaihi mim baininā bal huwa każżābun asyir(un).
translation_en: Has the message been sent down upon him from among us? Rather, he is an insolent liar."
translation_id: Apakah wahyu itu diturunkan kepadanya di antara kita? Pastilah dia (Saleh) seorang yang sangat pendusta lagi sombong.”

arabic: سَيَعْلَمُوْنَ غَدًا مَّنِ الْكَذَّابُ الْاَشِرُ
transliteration_en: Sa-ya'lamoona ghadam manil kazzaabul ashir
transliteration_id: Saya‘lamūna gadam manil-każżābul-asyir(u).
translation_en: They will know tomorrow who is the insolent liar.
translation_id: Kelak mereka akan mengetahui siapa yang sebenarnya sangat pendusta lagi sombong itu.

arabic: اِنَّا مُرْسِلُوا النَّاقَةِ فِتْنَةً لَّهُمْ فَارْتَقِبْهُمْ وَاصْطَبِرْۖ
transliteration_en: Innaa mursilun naaqati fitnatal lahum fartaqibhum wastabir
transliteration_id: Innā mursilun-nāqati fitnatal lahum fartaqibhum waṣṭabir.
translation_en: Indeed, We are sending the she-camel as trial for them, so watch them and be patient.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya Kami akan mengirimkan unta betina sebagai ujian bagi mereka, maka tunggulah mereka dan bersabarlah (wahai Saleh).

arabic: وَنَبِّئْهُمْ اَنَّ الْمَاۤءَ قِسْمَةٌ ۢ بَيْنَهُمْۚ  كُلُّ شِرْبٍ مُّحْتَضَرٌ
transliteration_en: Wa nabbi'hum annal maaa'a qismatum bainahum kullu shirbim muhtadar
transliteration_id: Wa nabbi'hum annal-mā'a qismatum bainahum, kullu syirbim muḥtaḍar(un).
translation_en: And inform them that the water is shared between them, each [day of] drink attended [by turn].
translation_id: Beri tahulah mereka bahwa air itu dibagi di antara mereka (dengan unta betina itu). Setiap pihak berhak mendapat giliran minum.

arabic: فَنَادَوْا صَاحِبَهُمْ فَتَعَاطٰى فَعَقَرَ
transliteration_en: Fanaadaw saahibahum fata'aataa fa'aqar
transliteration_id: Fa nādau ṣāḥibahum fa ta‘āṭā fa ‘aqar(a).
translation_en: But they called their companion, and he dared and hamstrung [her].
translation_id: Mereka memanggil kawannya, lalu dia menangkap (unta itu) dan menyembelihnya.

arabic: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِيْ وَنُذُرِ
transliteration_en: Fakaifa kaana 'azaabee wa nuzur
transliteration_id: Fakaifa kāna ‘ażābī wa nużur(i).
translation_en: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.
translation_id: Betapa dahsyatnya azab dan peringatan-Ku!

arabic: اِنَّآ اَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ صَيْحَةً وَّاحِدَةً فَكَانُوْا كَهَشِيْمِ الْمُحْتَظِرِ
transliteration_en: Innaaa arsalnaa 'alaihim saihatanw waahidatan fakaano kahasheemil muhtazir
transliteration_id: Innā arsalnā ‘alaihim ṣaiḥataw wāḥidatan fa kānū kahasyīmil-muḥtaẓir(i).
translation_en: Indeed, We sent upon them one blast from the sky, and they became like the dry twig fragments of an [animal] pen.
translation_id: Kami mengirimkan atas mereka suara menggelegar satu kali. Maka, jadilah mereka seperti batang-batang kering yang lapuk milik pembuat kandang ternak.

arabic: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْاٰنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِنْ مُّدَّكِرٍ
transliteration_en: Wa laqad yassarnal quraana liz zikri fahal mim muddakir
transliteration_id: Wa laqad yassarnal-qur'āna liż-żikri fahal mim muddakir(in).
translation_en: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
translation_id: Sungguh, Kami benar-benar telah memudahkan Al-Qur’an sebagai pelajaran. Adakah orang yang mau mengambil pelajaran?

arabic: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ لُوْطٍ ۢبِالنُّذُرِ
transliteration_en: Kazzabat qawmu lootim binnuzur
transliteration_id: Każżabat qaumu lūṭim bin-nużur(i).
translation_en: The people of Lot denied the warning.
translation_id: Kaum Lut pun telah mendustakan peringatan-peringatan.

arabic: اِنَّآ اَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ حَاصِبًا اِلَّآ اٰلَ لُوْطٍ ۗنَجَّيْنٰهُمْ بِسَحَرٍۙ
transliteration_en: Innaa arsalnaa 'alaihim haasiban illaaa aala Loot najjainaahum bisahar
transliteration_id: Innā arsalnā ‘alaihim ḥāṣiban illā āla lūṭ(in), najjaināhum bisaḥar(in).
translation_en: Indeed, We sent upon them a storm of stones, except the family of Lot - We saved them before dawn
translation_id: Sesungguhnya Kami menimpakan atas mereka badai batu, kecuali pengikut Lut. Kami menyelamatkan mereka sebelum fajar menyingsing

arabic: نِّعْمَةً مِّنْ عِنْدِنَاۗ  كَذٰلِكَ نَجْزِيْ مَنْ شَكَرَ
transliteration_en: Ni'matam min 'indinaa; kazaalika najzee man shakar
transliteration_id: Ni‘matam min ‘indinā, każālika najzī man syakar(a).
translation_en: As favor from us. Thus do We reward he who is grateful.
translation_id: sebagai nikmat dari Kami. Demikianlah Kami memberi balasan kepada orang-orang yang bersyukur.

arabic: وَلَقَدْ اَنْذَرَهُمْ بَطْشَتَنَا فَتَمَارَوْا بِالنُّذُرِ
transliteration_en: Wa laqad anzarahum batshatanaa fatamaaraw binnuzur
transliteration_id: Wa laqad anżarahum baṭsyatanā fa tamārau bin-nużur(i).
translation_en: And he had already warned them of Our assault, but they disputed the warning.
translation_id: Sungguh, dia (Lut) benar-benar telah memperingatkan mereka akan hukuman Kami, tetapi mereka membantah peringatan itu.

arabic: وَلَقَدْ رَاوَدُوْهُ عَنْ ضَيْفِهٖ فَطَمَسْنَآ اَعْيُنَهُمْ فَذُوْقُوْا عَذَابِيْ وَنُذُرِ
transliteration_en: Wa laqad raawadoohu 'andaifee fatamasnaaa a'yunahum fazooqoo 'azaabee wa nuzur
transliteration_id: Wa laqad rāwadūhu ‘an ḍaifihī fa ṭamasnā a‘yunahum fa żūqū ‘ażābī wa nużur(i).
translation_en: And they had demanded from him his guests, but We obliterated their eyes, [saying], "Taste My punishment and warning."
translation_id: Sungguh, mereka benar-benar telah membujuknya berkali-kali (agar menyerahkan) tamunya (kepada mereka). Lalu, Kami butakan mata mereka. Maka, rasakanlah azab-Ku dan peringatan-peringatan-Ku!

arabic: وَلَقَدْ صَبَّحَهُمْ بُكْرَةً عَذَابٌ مُّسْتَقِرٌّۚ
transliteration_en: Wa laqad sabbahahum bukratan 'azaabum mustaqirr
transliteration_id: Wa laqad ṣabbaḥahum bukratan ‘ażābum mustaqirr(un).
translation_en: And there came upon them by morning an abiding punishment.
translation_id: Sungguh, pada esok harinya mereka benar-benar ditimpa azab yang terus-menerus.

arabic: فَذُوْقُوْا عَذَابِيْ وَنُذُرِ
transliteration_en: Fazooqoo 'azaabee wa nuzur
transliteration_id: Fa żūqū ‘ażābī wa nużur(i).
translation_en: So taste My punishment and warning.
translation_id: Maka, rasakanlah azab-Ku dan peringatan-peringatan-Ku!

arabic: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْاٰنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِنْ مُّدَّكِرٍ ࣖ
transliteration_en: Wa laqad yassarnal Quraana liz zikri fahal mim muddakir
transliteration_id: Wa laqad yassarnal-qur'āna liż-żikri fahal mim muddakir(in).
translation_en: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
translation_id: Sungguh, Kami benar-benar telah memudahkan Al-Qur’an sebagai pelajaran. Maka, adakah orang yang mau mengambil pelajaran?

arabic: وَلَقَدْ جَاۤءَ اٰلَ فِرْعَوْنَ النُّذُرُۚ
transliteration_en: Wa laqad jaaa'a Aala Fir'awnan nuzur
transliteration_id: Wa laqad jā'a āla fir‘aunan-nużur(u).
translation_en: And there certainly came to the people of Pharaoh warning.
translation_id: Sungguh, berbagai peringatan benar-benar telah datang kepada pengikut Fir‘aun.

arabic: كَذَّبُوْا بِاٰيٰتِنَا كُلِّهَا فَاَخَذْنٰهُمْ اَخْذَ عَزِيْزٍ مُّقْتَدِرٍ
transliteration_en: Kazzaboo bi Aayaatinaa kullihaa fa akhaznaahum akhza 'azeezim muqtadir
transliteration_id: Każżabū bi'āyātinā kullihā fa'akhażnāhum akhża ‘azīzim muqtadir(in).
translation_en: They denied Our signs, all of them, so We seized them with a seizure of one Exalted in Might and Perfect in Ability.
translation_id: Mereka mendustakan semua tanda-tanda (kebesaran) Kami. Maka, Kami mengazab mereka dengan azab (Tuhan) Yang Maha Perkasa lagi Maha Kuasa.

arabic: اَكُفَّارُكُمْ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ اُولٰۤىِٕكُمْ اَمْ لَكُمْ بَرَاۤءَةٌ فِى الزُّبُرِۚ
transliteration_en: Akuffaarukum khairum min ulaaa'ikum am lakum baraaa'atun fiz Zubur
transliteration_id: Akuffārukum khairum min ulā'ikum am lakum barā'atun fiz-zubur(i).
translation_en: Are your disbelievers better than those [former ones], or have you immunity in the scripture?
translation_id: Apakah orang-orang kafir di lingkunganmu (kaum Quraisy) lebih baik daripada mereka (kaum terdahulu) ataukah kamu telah mempunyai (jaminan) kebebasan (dari azab) dalam kitab-kitab terdahulu?

arabic: اَمْ يَقُوْلُوْنَ نَحْنُ جَمِيْعٌ مُّنْتَصِرٌ
transliteration_en: Am yaqooloona nahnu jamee'um muntasir
transliteration_id: Am yaqūlūna naḥnu jamī‘um muntaṣir(un).
translation_en: Or do they say, "We are an assembly supporting [each other]"?
translation_id: Bahkan, apakah mereka mengatakan, “Kami adalah golongan yang pasti menang.”

arabic: سَيُهْزَمُ الْجَمْعُ وَيُوَلُّوْنَ الدُّبُرَ
transliteration_en: Sa yuhzamul jam'u wa yuwalloonad dubur
transliteration_id: Sayuhzamul-jam‘u wa yuwallūnad-dubur(a).
translation_en: [Their] assembly will be defeated, and they will turn their backs [in retreat].
translation_id: Golongan itu pasti akan dikalahkan dan mereka berbalik ke belakang (mundur).

arabic: بَلِ السَّاعَةُ مَوْعِدُهُمْ وَالسَّاعَةُ اَدْهٰى وَاَمَرُّ
transliteration_en: Balis Saa'atu maw'iduhum was Saa'atu adhaa wa amarr
transliteration_id: Balis-sā‘atu mau‘iduhum was-sā‘atu adhā wa amarr(u).
translation_en: But the Hour is their appointment [for due punishment], and the Hour is more disastrous and more bitter.
translation_id: Bahkan hari Kiamat itulah hari yang dijanjikan kepada mereka. Hari Kiamat itu lebih dahsyat dan lebih pahit.

arabic: اِنَّ الْمُجْرِمِيْنَ فِيْ ضَلٰلٍ وَّسُعُرٍۘ
transliteration_en: Innal mujrimeena fee dalaalinw wa su'ur
transliteration_id: Innal-mujrimīna fī ḍalāliw wa su‘ur(in).
translation_en: Indeed, the criminals are in error and madness.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya para pendurhaka berada dalam kesesatan dan akan berada dalam (neraka) Sa‘ir (yang menyala-nyala).

arabic: يَوْمَ يُسْحَبُوْنَ فِى النَّارِ عَلٰى وُجُوْهِهِمْۗ ذُوْقُوْا مَسَّ سَقَرَ
transliteration_en: Yawma yushaboona fin Naari'alaa wujoohimim zooqoo massa saqar
transliteration_id: Yauma yusḥabūna fin-nāri ‘alā wujūhihim, żūqū massa saqar(a).
translation_en: The Day they are dragged into the Fire on their faces [it will be said], "Taste the touch of Saqar."
translation_id: Pada hari (ketika) mereka diseret ke neraka dengan wajah (tertelungkup), (dikatakan kepada mereka,) “Rasakanlah sentuhan (api neraka) Saqar.”

arabic: اِنَّا كُلَّ شَيْءٍ خَلَقْنٰهُ بِقَدَرٍ
transliteration_en: Innaa kulla shai'in khalaqnaahu biqadar
transliteration_id: Innā kulla syai'in khalaqnāhu biqadar(in).
translation_en: Indeed, all things We created with predestination.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya Kami menciptakan segala sesuatu sesuai dengan ukuran.

arabic: وَمَآ اَمْرُنَآ اِلَّا وَاحِدَةٌ كَلَمْحٍ ۢبِالْبَصَرِ
transliteration_en: Wa maaa amrunaaa illaa waahidatun kalamhim bilbasar
transliteration_id: Wa mā amrunā illā wāḥidatun kalamḥim bil-baṣar(i).
translation_en: And Our command is but one, like a glance of the eye.
translation_id: Perintah Kami (ketika menghendaki sesuatu) hanyalah (dengan perkataan) sekali saja seperti kejapan mata.
